body:
Comment 68: 
I have some large maps, but I don't think they're that large. This program is running on
a 2GB machine with room to spare:

Mem: 332M Active, 1118M Inact, 335M Wired, 19M Cache, 200M Buf, 38M Free
Swap: 954M Total, 4812K Used, 949M Free

  PID USERNAME      THR PRI NICE   SIZE    RES STATE   C   TIME   WCPU COMMAND
 2371 root           12  20    0   567M   308M uwait   2   0:30  0.00% redwood

But I'll try applying that patch anyway.
